text: Elections in Réunion gives information on elections and election results in Réunion. Réunion elects on regional/départemental level a legislature. The legislature consists out of two councils with diverging powers. The Regional Council (Conseil régional) has 45 members, elected for a six-year term by proportional representation. The General Council (Conseil général) has members elected for a five-year term in single seat-constituencies. Reunion has a multi-party system, with numerous parties in which no one party often has a chance of gaining power alone, and parties must work with each other to form coalition governments. ==Recent elections== {| class=wikitable style=text- align:right !rowspan=2|Party !colspan=2|First round !colspan=4|Second round |- !Votes !% !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|Alliance for Réunion (PCR–FD–MoDem)||71,602||30.23||112,201||35.55||12||–15 |- |align=left|OR–UMP–NC–LGM||62,581||26.42||143,485||45.56||27||+16 |- |align=left|PS–MRC||30,941||13.06||59,933||8.99||6||–1 |- |align=left|Réunion Nout'Fierté||15,952||6.73||rowspan=9 colspan=2| ||0||New |- |align=left|Better Future for the People of Réunion in France and Europe||14,014||5.92||0||0 |- |align=left|Miscellaneous Right Movement||12,734||5.38||0||New |- |align=left|For Total Equality||11,809||4.99||0||New |- |align=left|Europe Écologie||11,685||4.93||0||New |- |align=left|Nasion Rénioné||2,097||0.89||0||0 |- |align=left|Lutte Ouvrière||1,944||0.82||0||0 |- |align=left|Réunionese Democratic Union||231||0.10||0||New |- |align=left|Independents||1,297||0.53||0||0 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||13,015||–||13,005||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total||249,872||100||328,624||100||45||0 |- |align=left|Registered voters/turnout||550,442||45.35||550,480||59.70||–||–| |- |align=left colspan=7|Source: French Politics, La Réunion |} ==See also== *Electoral calendar *Electoral system
